scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.applet-dev: concurrently "UI_PORT=8888 npm run start -w ui" "weave --agent-idx 1 --dev-config ./weave.dev.config.ts" "sleep 5 && weave --agent-idx 2 --dev-config ./weave.dev.config.ts --sync-time 6000"
scripts.applet-dev-3: concurrently "UI_PORT=8888 npm run start -w ui" "weave --agent-idx 1 --dev-config ./weave.dev.config.ts" "sleep 5 && weave --agent-idx 2 --dev-config ./weave.dev.config.ts --sync-time 10000" "sleep 5 && weave --agent-idx 3 --dev-config ./weave.dev.config.ts --sync-time 10000"
scripts.launch:happ: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port 9998 --signal-port 9999" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/presence.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:9998 webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:9999"
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.package:ui: npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
